markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 5" pfs="Standard">
[Elemental Blast](/Spells.aspx?ID=2107)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=721" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=561" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=645" />
<trait label="Sorcerer" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=148" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 264 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Bloodline**
[Elemental](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=24)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet (burst only)

**Area** 10-foot-radius burst, 30-foot cone, or 60-foot line

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Defense**
[basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=2297) Reflex

</row>

</column>

---

You gather elemental energy and blast your foes in one of the various listed shapes of your choosing, dealing 8d6 damage. This spell deals damage according to your elemental influence (for instance, slashing for air or fire for fire) and has your element's trait.

---
**Heightened (+1)** The damage increases by 2d6.
name: Elemental Blast

This spell deals damage according to your elemental influence (for instance, slashing for air or fire for fire) and has your element's trait. --- Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 2d6.
